title: Xbox's Big E3 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.31.19
description:
Use code KFGAMES for 74% off Omaha Steaks Father’s Day Steak Fix Gift Offer at http://omahasteaks.com

The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/kindafunnygamesdaily4 to start your trial now. 

Andrea's back to talk to Greg about Phil Spencer's 14 Xbox Game Studios games at its E3 conference.

Time stamps - 
00:05:46 - Housekeeping
Nick Names and Oreo on patreon.com/kindafunny for $1!
The Kinda Funny Games E3 Showcase is Monday, June 10th at 4:30 p.m. youtube.com/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:09:04 - Phil Spencer says…
00:11:33 - “What can we expect from these Microsoft studios at E3?” - BJ Bernardo
00:25:14 - Apex Season 2 Tidbits
00:26:50 - Anthem Stream Recap
00:38:18 - Twitch Moves to 2-Factor Authentication
00:39:40 - Baulder’s Gate 3 at E3?
00:43:51 - Out today
00:47:51 -  Omaha Steaks
00:49:09 - Skillshare
Reader mail   -
00:49:59 - “What do you predict the critical reception to the Modern Warfare reboot will be compared to its sales?” - Constanine
01:02:48 - Squad Up: James G - Twitter - @JaymezGee
01:04:18 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Tim
Tuesday - Greg & Andrea
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Fran & ????
Friday - Tim & Mike Mahardy
